title: Two different replacement devices from Assurant were both dysfunctional. Is there any recourse?
content:
I have replaced my phone twice and both refurbished phones from Assurant have had hardware or firmware problems. One stopped charging and another has a wifi hotspot and bluetooth issue preventing me from turning on either feature.

This seems similar to https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/76891810?hl=en&msgid=76891810
